title: QueryFinalityProviderResponse
description: QueryFinalityProviderResponse contains information about a finality provider

FinalityProviderResponse.description: FinalityProviderResponse defines a finality provider with voting power information. Keep these commented-out fields for convenience to get the right order of decoding fields.

consumer_id.description: consumer_id is the consumer id this finality provider is registered to

height.description: height is the queried Babylon height

slashed_babylon_height.description: description defines the description terms for the finality provider. commission defines the commission rate of the finality provider. babylon_pk is the Babylon secp256k1 PK of this finality provider btc_pk is the Bitcoin secp256k1 PK of this finality provider the PK follows encoding in BIP-340 spec pop is the proof of possession of babylon_pk and btc_pk slashed_babylon_height indicates the Babylon height when the finality provider is slashed. if it's 0 then the finality provider is not slashed

slashed_btc_height.description: slashed_btc_height indicates the BTC height when the finality provider is slashed. if it's 0 then the finality provider is not slashed

voting_power.description: voting_power is the voting power of this finality provider at the given height
